ERC20Mintable","name":"","type":"address"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"SeigManager gives seigniorage to operator and WTON holders. For each commit by operator, operator (or user) will get seigniorage in propotion to the staked (or delegated) amount of WTON. * [Tokens] - {tot} tracks total staked or delegated WTON of each RootChain contract (and depositor?). - {coinages[rootchain]} tracks staked or delegated WTON of user or operator to a RootChain contract. * For each commit by operator, 1. increases all root chains' balance of {tot} by (the staked amount of WTON) /    (total supply of TON and WTON) * (num blocks * seigniorage per block). 2. increases all depositors' blanace of {coinages[rootchain]} in proportion to the staked amount of WTON,    up to the increased amount in step (1). 3. set the root chain's balance of {committed} as the root chain's {tot} balance. * For each stake or delegate with amount of {v} to a RootChain, 1. mint {v} {coinages[rootchain]} tokens to the account 2. mint {v} {tot} tokens to the root chain contract * For each unstake or undelegate (or get rewards) with amount of {v} to a RootChain, 1. burn {v} {coinages[rootchain]} tokens from the account 2. burn {v + \u237a} {tot} tokens from the root chain contract,  where \u237a = SEIGS * staked ratio of the root chian * withdrawal ratio of the account    - SEIGS                              = tot total supply - tot total supply at last commit from the root chain    - staked ratio of the root chian     = tot balance of the root chain / tot total supply    - withdrawal ratio of the account  = amount to withdraw / total supply of coinage ","methods":{"deployCoinage(address)":{"details":"deploy coinage token for the root chain."},"isOwner()":{"details":"Returns true if the caller is the current owner."},"onCommit()":{"details":"Callback for a new commit"},"onDeposit(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Callback for a new deposit"},"onTransfer(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Callback for a token transfer"},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setPowerTON(address)":{"details":"set PowerTON contract, only by owner."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"unpause()":{"details":"Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state."}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"constructor":"///////////////////////////","pause()":{"notice":"///////////////////////////"},"registry()":{"notice":"///////////////////////////"},"uncomittedStakeOf(address,address)":{"notice":"///////////////////////////"}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Users/thomashin/Workspace/plasma-evm-contracts/contracts/stake/managers/SeigManager.sol":"SeigManager"},"evmVersion":"petersburg","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Users/thomashin/Workspace/plasma-evm-contracts/contracts/RootChainI.sol":{"keccak256":"0x664e699d6afd7a839f5fae13a661b3446aeb655b0e1df5cf11f1d5fe849aae18","urls":["bzz-raw://c6e912566cd48ac2a5355eed0c1a26cbdd49bb50f2e32e0e45d9d3804709b359","dweb:/ipfs/QmZP9RsBZSmsvJYAqtfP2G51iUyuLoXieJQA3YFZLdPayZ"]},"/Users/thomashin/Workspace/plasma-evm-contracts/contracts/stake/interfaces/DepositManagerI.sol":{"keccak256":"0x66c68b83741295f1bcc5741b7725afcbda45535fa1f67c760c2bc6c2afc2d2bb","urls":["bzz-raw://676abfd4d89dee4e7027b1e4046659c98ef752f3aa9f07416a00cf5e1f9be3ff","dweb:/ipfs/QmfBTTZwYw2AbnTz8higwYKwKdzVofTcjpQ1bLrczG4WSi"]},"/Users/thomashin/Workspace/plasma-evm-contracts/contracts/stake/interfaces/PowerTONI.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf1ec3481b867528edecb14b2f8f0c297d49c643ab12e90cdbce06c3e79e98b03","urls":["bzz-raw://5a275201df8dc1d3d548c462a3a1c8205e3e36fafc15a3994671bded7f4b0c90","dweb:/ipfs/Qmf2SHzwACEPM3jvDobMw4FDvutqEN3eNekEViyG8vbtqf"]},"/Users/thomashin/Workspace/plasma-evm-contracts/contracts/stake/interfaces/RootChainRegistryI.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3e3a51f693458ec1041efe5b84bfa128d2531994b078be12490551a29d1055e6","urls":["bzz-raw://fbdf92cafd71c0ad016e9ea9109dc641a683d49fef1f205627c3447066c74f28","dweb:/ipfs/QmPzybmvXhf7sJMdWUsBKEo62zroy5oL5bxt3nevjs6Ayr"]},"/Users/thomashin/Workspace/plasma-evm-contracts/contracts/stake/interfaces/SeigManagerI.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4bbf3f561e6ecf488dc7efc1011d15eed43e345a68cdb35c54bb2177e06fc4d0","urls":["bzz-raw://3927ae9bef0f7d3 nodes.documentation:
@dev SeigManager gives seigniorage to operator and WTON holders.
For each commit by operator, operator (or user) will get seigniorage
in propotion to the staked (or delegated) amount of WTON.
 * [Tokens]
- {tot} tracks total staked or delegated WTON of each RootChain contract (and depositor?).
- {coinages[rootchain]} tracks staked or delegated WTON of user or operator to a RootChain contract.
 * For each commit by operator,
 1. increases all root chains' balance of {tot} by (the staked amount of WTON) /
    (total supply of TON and WTON) * (num blocks * seigniorage per block).
 2. increases all depositors' blanace of {coinages[rootchain]} in proportion to the staked amount of WTON,
    up to the increased amount in step (1).
 3. set the root chain's balance of {committed} as the root chain's {tot} balance.
 * For each stake or delegate with amount of {v} to a RootChain,
 1. mint {v} {coinages[rootchain]} tokens to the account
 2. mint {v} {tot} tokens to the root chain contract
 * For each unstake or undelegate (or get rewards) with amount of {v} to a RootChain,
 1. burn {v} {coinages[rootchain]} tokens from the account
 2. burn {v + ⍺} {tot} tokens from the root chain contract,
  where ⍺ = SEIGS * staked ratio of the root chian * withdrawal ratio of the account
    - SEIGS                              = tot total supply - tot total supply at last commit from the root chain
    - staked ratio of the root chian     = tot balance of the root chain / tot total supply
    - withdrawal ratio of the account  = amount to withdraw / total supply of coinage
nodes.name: SeigManager

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "SeigManager: coinage has not been deployed yet"

arguments.value: SeigManager: coinage has not been deployed yet

deployCoinage(address).details: deploy coinage token for the root chain.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setPowerTON(address).details: set PowerTON contract, only by owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.
